title: Delicious Bites
description: At Wine 30 on Oak Street, we complement our impressive selection of wines and craft beers with a delectable array of bites. From artisan cheese platters to mouthwatering charcuterie boards, our menu is designed to elevate your drinking experience. Indulge in gourmet small plates and tasty nibbles that pair perfectly with your favorite drink. Join us for a delightful culinary journey where each bite is as memorable as the sips. Cheers to good food and great company!
alttext: Full charcuterie board with a glass of wine beside it
